class.name: OpenXRMlMarkerDetectorQrSettings
class.experimental: Marked as experimental due to lack of community validation on Magic Leap devices.

members.member: If set to [code]true[/code] the detector will estimate the size of the marker.

The physical length of one side of a marker in meters. A higher localization accuracy may be obtained by specifying the marker size. This value is ignored if [member estimate_qr_length] is set to [code]true[/code].
